aes_encrypt.sql: SELECT AES_ENCRYPT(`value`, `key`) FROM (SELECT 'data' AS `value`, 'k' AS `key`) AS t

case.sql: SELECT CASE NULL WHEN NULL THEN 'null' ELSE 'not null' END
SELECT CASE WHEN 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END
SELECT CASE 1 WHEN '1' THEN 'match' ELSE 'mismatch' END
SELECT CASE BINARY 'A' WHEN 'a' THEN 'equal' ELSE 'unequal' END
SELECT CASE '2023-01-01' WHEN CAST('2023-01-01' AS DATE) THEN 'date' ELSE 'str' END
SELECT CASE 1.0 WHEN 1 THEN 'int' ELSE 'float' END
SELECT CASE WHEN '' THEN 'empty' ELSE 'non-empty' END
SELECT CASE 0x0A WHEN X'0A' THEN 'hex' ELSE 'not' END
SELECT CASE WHEN NULLIF(1,1) IS NULL THEN 'null' ELSE 'val' END
SELECT CASE WHEN CASE WHEN 0 THEN 1 END IS NULL THEN 'null' END
SELECT CASE 9999999999 WHEN 9999999999 THEN 'equal' ELSE 'unequal' END
SELECT CASE _utf8mb4'test' WHEN 'test' THEN 'match' END
SELECT CASE 1/0 WHEN 0 THEN 'valid' ELSE 'error' END
SELECT CASE WHEN UNHEX('7F') = 0x7F THEN 'hex' END
SELECT CASE 0x4A WHEN CHAR(74) THEN 'J' END
SELECT CASE '0.0' WHEN 0 THEN 'num' ELSE 'char' END
SELECT CASE WHEN TRUE = 1 THEN 'match' END
SELECT CASE WHEN 0.0 THEN 'zero' ELSE 'non-zero' END
SELECT CASE 0b1010 WHEN 10 THEN 'binary' END
SELECT CASE 1E0 WHEN 1 THEN 'float=1' END

cast.sql: SELECT CAST('invalid' AS DATE)
SELECT CAST(CAST('0000-00-00' AS DATE) AS CHAR)
SELECT CAST(123.456 AS BINARY)
SELECT CAST(_binary'\x00\x1a' AS CHAR)
SELECT CAST('12:34:56' AS TIME) + CAST('1:00:00' AS TIME)
SELECT CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL(5,2)) + CAST('7.5' AS DECIMAL)
SELECT CAST(TRUE AS UNSIGNED) << 3
SELECT CAST(CAST('2023-02-30' AS DATE) AS DATETIME)
SELECT CAST(CAST(12345678901234567890 AS UNSIGNED) AS CHAR)
SELECT CAST('000987' AS SIGNED) / CAST('0' AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT CAST(CAST('test' AS BINARY) AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8mb4)
SELECT CAST(JSON_ARRAY(1,'a') AS CHAR)
SELECT CAST(CAST(123456.789 AS DECIMAL(5,2)) AS TIME)
SELECT CAST(X'48656C6C6F' AS CHAR(5))
SELECT CAST(CAST('9999-12-31 23:59:59' AS DATETIME) AS DATE)
SELECT CAST(CAST('32768' AS SIGNED) AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT CAST(2147483648 AS SIGNED) * CAST(2 AS SIGNED)
SELECT CAST(CAST('1.7976931348623157E+308' AS DOUBLE) AS DECIMAL(30,10))
SELECT CAST('中文' AS CHAR CHARACTER SET latin1)
SELECT CAST(UNHEX('616263') AS DATE)
SELECT CAST('invalid_date' AS DATETIME)
SELECT CAST('9999-99-99' AS DATE) + INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT CAST(UNHEX('4B696C6C') AS CHAR(4))
SELECT CAST(CAST(123456789.987654321 AS DECIMAL(10,3)) AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT CAST('true' AS BOOLEAN) XOR CAST(0 AS BOOL)
SELECT CAST(CAST('12.3e4' AS FLOAT) AS DECIMAL(10,0))
SELECT CAST('中文测试' AS BINARY) = CAST('中文测试' AS CHAR)
SELECT CAST(NULL AS TIME) IS NULL
SELECT CAST(2147483647 + 1 AS SIGNED)
SELECT CAST('32767' AS SIGNED) + CAST('32768' AS UNSIGNED)
SELECT CAST(CAST('2025-13-32' AS DATE) AS YEAR)
SELECT CAST(0xDEADBEEF AS CHAR(8))
SELECT CAST(1.0e308 AS DECIMAL(65,30))
SELECT CAST('NaN' AS DECIMAL(10,2))
SELECT CAST('24:00:00' AS TIME)
SELECT CAST(X'C3A9' AS CHAR CHARSET utf8mb4)
SELECT CAST(CAST('' AS BINARY) AS DATE)
SELECT CAST(JSON_OBJECT('key', 123) AS CHAR(100))

char_length.comment: ENCODE function doesn't exist for MySQL

charset.sql: SELECT CHARSET(CONCAT(CONVERT('a' USING latin1), CONVERT('b' USING utf8mb4)))

curdate.sql: SELECT CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 MONTH
SELECT CURDATE() IN (CURDATE(), CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT CURDATE() AS date UNION SELECT CURDATE() + INTERVAL 1 DAY
SELECT CASE WHEN CURDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

current_date.sql: SELECT current_date + INTERVAL 1 DAY - INTERVAL 1 SECOND
SELECT CASE WHEN current_date THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

database.sql: SELECT DATABASE() WHERE DATABASE() IS NULL

database.comment: default collation for MySQL is utf8mb3

database.sql: SELECT @@character_set_database WHERE DATABASE() IS NOT NULL
SELECT DATABASE() WHERE DATABASE() LIKE '%\_schema' ESCAPE '\'

date_sub.sql: SELECT DATE_SUB(CAST('2024-01-01' AS DATE), INTERVAL 1 QUARTER)

export_set.sql: SELECT EXPORT_SET(NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
SELECT EXPORT_SET(0, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)

extract.sql: SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM CAST('2024-05-21' AS JSON))

found_rows.sql: SELECT FOUND_ROWS()
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() + 5
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS NULL) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 UNION SELECT 2) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL LIMIT 0) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() AS total FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 'a' FROM DUAL) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() / 0
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 WHERE 0) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL GROUP BY 1) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 HAVING 1=1) AS t
SELECT (SELECT FOUND_ROWS()) FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 UNION ALL SELECT 1) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() IN (0,1)
SELECT IF(FOUND_ROWS() > 0, 'Yes', 'No')
SELECT CONCAT('Total: ', FOUND_ROWS())
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL WHERE 1=0) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1, 2 FROM DUAL) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * FROM (SELECT 1) AS s) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL ORDER BY 1) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() - 3
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 WHERE FALSE) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 UNION SELECT NULL) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS * FROM (SELECT 1, 'a') AS s) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() BETWEEN 5 AND 10
SELECT CASE FOUND_ROWS() WHEN 0 THEN 'Empty' ELSE 'Exists' END
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 WHERE NULL) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL WHERE 'a' = 'b') AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() * NULL
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL JOIN (SELECT 1) AS s) AS t
SELECT 1 WHERE FOUND_ROWS() = 0
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS NULL FROM DUAL GROUP BY ()) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() << 2
SELECT SIN(FOUND_ROWS())
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1/0) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL LIMIT 5 OFFSET 3) AS t
SELECT ASCII(SUBSTRING('test', FOUND_ROWS(), 1))
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 AS a, 2 AS b) AS t
SELECT FOUND_ROWS() FROM (SELECT SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS 1 FROM DUAL HAVING COUNT(*)=1) AS t

greatest.sql: SELECT GREATEST(CHAR(255 USING utf8mb4), CHAR(255 USING latin1))

grouping.sql: SELECT GROUPING(a) FROM (SELECT 1 AS a, NULL AS b UNION ALL SELECT 2, 5) t GROUP BY a, b WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(str) FROM (SELECT 'a' str UNION ALL SELECT NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'b') t GROUP BY str WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(d) FROM (SELECT DATE('2023-01-01') d UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY d WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(num + 0) FROM (SELECT '1' num UNION ALL SELECT 'abc') t GROUP BY num + 0 WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(b) FROM (SELECT 1 a, 2 b UNION ALL SELECT 1, NULL) t GROUP BY a, b WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(COALESCE(col, 0)) FROM (SELECT NULL col UNION ALL SELECT 5) t GROUP BY COALESCE(col, 0) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(UPPER(str)) FROM (SELECT 'a' str UNION ALL SELECT 'A') t GROUP BY UPPER(str) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(a) AS grp FROM (SELECT 1 a UNION ALL SELECT 2) t GROUP BY a WITH ROLLUP HAVING grp = 1
SELECT GROUPING(CONCAT(a, b)) FROM (SELECT 'x' a, 'y' b UNION ALL SELECT NULL, 'z') t GROUP BY a, b WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(IFNULL(a, -1)) FROM (SELECT NULL a UNION ALL SELECT 1) t GROUP BY IFNULL(a, -1) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(SUBSTR(s, 1, 1)) FROM (SELECT 'test' s UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY SUBSTR(s, 1, 1) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(CAST(v AS DECIMAL)) FROM (SELECT '5.5' v UNION ALL SELECT 'X') t GROUP BY CAST(v AS DECIMAL) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(a + NULL) FROM (SELECT 1 a UNION ALL SELECT 2) t GROUP BY a + NULL WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(JSON_EXTRACT('{}', '$')) FROM (SELECT 1) t GROUP BY JSON_EXTRACT('{}', '$') WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(CHAR(97)) FROM (SELECT CHAR(97) c UNION ALL SELECT CHAR(98)) t GROUP BY CHAR(97) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(BINARY 'a') FROM (SELECT 'a' UNION ALL SELECT 'A') t GROUP BY BINARY 'a' WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(1/0) FROM (SELECT 1) t GROUP BY 1/0 WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(UNIX_TIMESTAMP()) FROM (SELECT 1) t GROUP BY UNIX_TIMESTAMP() WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(GEOMFROMTEXT('POINT(1 1)')) FROM (SELECT 1) t GROUP BY GEOMFROMTEXT('POINT(1 1)') WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(x + y) FROM (SELECT 1 x, 2 y UNION ALL SELECT 3, 4) t GROUP BY x + y WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(CAST(val AS UNSIGNED)) FROM (SELECT '123' val UNION ALL SELECT 'abc') t GROUP BY CAST(val AS UNSIGNED) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(REVERSE(s)) FROM (SELECT 'xyz' s UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY REVERSE(s) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(ABS(x)) FROM (SELECT -5 x UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY ABS(x) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(BIN(n)) FROM (SELECT 10 n UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY BIN(n) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(ASCII(c)) FROM (SELECT 'A' c UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY ASCII(c) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(LENGTH(s)) FROM (SELECT 'hello' s UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY LENGTH(s) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(MOD(a, b)) FROM (SELECT 7 a, 3 b UNION ALL SELECT 5, 0) t GROUP BY MOD(a, b) WITH ROLLUP
SELECT GROUPING(RADIANS(deg)) FROM (SELECT 180 deg UNION ALL SELECT NULL) t GROUP BY RADIANS(deg) WITH ROLLUP

is.sql: SELECT CAST('2023-01-01' AS DATE) IS NOT NULL
SELECT (CASE WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) IS NULL
SELECT (1 IS NOT UNKNOWN) IS TRUE
SELECT CAST('invalid' AS UNSIGNED) IS NULL
SELECT CONVERT('a', BINARY) IS NOT NULL
SELECT INTERVAL 1 DAY IS NOT NULL
SELECT (NULL IS NOT TRUE) IS TRUE

is_ipv6.sql: SELECT IS_IPV6(CASE WHEN NULL THEN '::1' ELSE ':::2' END)

json_array_append.sql: SELECT JSON_ARRAY_APPEND('{"key with space": [1]}', '$."key with space"', 2)

json_contains.sql: SELECT JSON_CONTAINS(CAST('[1,2]' AS JSON), CAST('3' AS JSON))

json_merge_preserve.sql: SELECT JSON_MERGE_PRESERVE(CAST('[]' AS JSON), CAST('{}' AS JSON))
SELECT JSON_MERGE_PRESERVE(CAST('false' AS JSON), CAST('{"bool":1}' AS JSON))

json_object.comment: One returns \b, another return \u0008. It's actually the same.

lcase.sql: SELECT LCASE('A VERY LONG STRING WITH UPPERCASE LETTERS')

localtimestamp.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN LOCALTIMESTAMP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
SELECT CASE WHEN LOCALTIMESTAMP IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

ord.sql: SELECT ORD('') FROM DUAL WHERE ORD('') IS NOT NULL

replace.sql: SELECT REPLACE('重叠替换', '替换', '测试')

row.sql: SELECT ROW('', CHAR(0)) IS NOT NULL
SELECT ROW(1, 2, 3) BETWEEN ROW(0, 1, 2) AND ROW(2, 3, 4)

row_count.sql: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1), (2); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t SELECT 1 WHERE 0; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT PRIMARY KEY); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE a = 1; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); DELETE FROM t; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); DELETE FROM t; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1), (2); UPDATE t SET a = 3 WHERE a = 2; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); UPDATE t SET a = 1; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT PRIMARY KEY); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); REPLACE INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT() + ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT() || ' rows'
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (NULL); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT 1 INTO @var; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT ROW_COUNT() FROM DUAL WHERE ROW_COUNT() IS NULL
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT 1) AS tmp WHERE 0; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
START TRANSACTION; CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); ROLLBACK; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); UPDATE t SET a = 1; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT SLEEP(0) INTO @var; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1),(2),(3); DELETE FROM t WHERE a > 1; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); UPDATE t SET a = 5; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
START TRANSACTION; INSERT INTO t VALUES (4); ROLLBACK; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL WHERE 0; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t SELECT 1 LIMIT 0; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t2 (a INT); INSERT INTO t SELECT * FROM t2; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); UPDATE t SET a = NULL WHERE a = 1; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); INSERT INTO t SELECT * FROM t; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); REPLACE INTO t VALUES (1); REPLACE INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT 1 INTO @dummy; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
UPDATE information_schema.tables SET table_name='test' WHERE 0; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1), (2); DELETE FROM t; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
INSERT INTO non_existent_table VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT()
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); UPDATE t SET a = a; SELECT ROW_COUNT()
SELECT ROW_COUNT() AS rc FROM (SELECT 1) AS tmp
SELECT ROW_COUNT() FROM (SELECT 1) AS tmp WHERE ROW_COUNT() >= 0
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t (a INT); INSERT INTO t VALUES (1); SELECT ROW_COUNT(), ROW_COUNT()

schema.sql: SELECT SCHEMA() WHERE SCHEMA() IS NULL
SELECT CASE WHEN SCHEMA() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

session_user.sql: SELECT SESSION_USER() FROM DUAL WHERE SESSION_USER() LIKE '%@%';
SELECT CASE WHEN SESSION_USER() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END;
SELECT SESSION_USER() AS su, su LIKE '%@%';

subdate.sql: SELECT SUBDATE(CAST('2024-01-01' AS DATETIME), INTERVAL 25 HOUR)
SELECT SUBDATE(CAST('2025-05-05' AS DATE), INTERVAL TRUE MONTH)

sysdate.sql: SELECT CASE SYSDATE() WHEN NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

system_user.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN system_user() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

ucase.sql: SELECT UCASE(CAST('test' AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8))

user.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN USER() IS NULL THEN 'NULL' ELSE 'NOT NULL' END

utc_date.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN UTC_DATE() IS NULL THEN 'NULL' ELSE 'NOT NULL' END
